name: Tiny Arcade
description:
MY NEW GAMES

welcome to my tiny arcade. 

it is full of tiny games. 

water my plant!

eat some raisin bread!

find the paw print! 

these are just some of the things you might find yourself doing.

I hope you enjoy my new games~

*audio is important, so maybe play with headphones? or just turn up those speakers?* 

~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~

THE REVIEWS ARE IN

"Very cute, I like it." - My Brother "I've heard it's very cute.  I'm looking forward to playing it." - My Father "Most of it was my idea so I'm a pretty big fan." -Salazar

~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ CONTROLS ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~

W/A/S/D or Arrow Keys to Move

Mouse to look around. 

Click to progress through the arcade cabinet games. 

~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ CREDITS ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~

A BIG THANK YOU TO:  Salazar who very kindly played early builds of this game and gave me the idea to showcase my games in the arcade space and also gave the idea for the flower loading screen. She is the bomb dot com. 

The tiny games were inspired by (but not made in) the excellent Flick Game tool made by Increpare.

~~~~~~~~

Thanks for playing! 

Crawlspace ~ 2018
